00016 VelocityController::VelocityController(float damping, float springConstant, float maxVel)

00036 void VelocityController::Update(NiPoint3 &currentVel, const NiPoint3 &desiredVel)
00037 {
00038         // generate force
00039         NiPoint3 force  = -m_fSpringConstant * (desiredVel - currentVel) + m_fDamping*currentVel; 
00040         // finds new velocity
00041         NiPoint3 newVel =  currentVel - force*0.1;
00042 
00043         // check if new velocity exceeds certain limits and constrain it
00044         // if needed
00045         float newVelLength = newVel.Length();
00046 
00047         if (newVelLength < -m_fMaxVelocity)
00048         {
00049                 NiPoint3 heading = newVel;
00050                 heading.Unitize();      
00051                 newVel = -m_fMaxVelocity*heading;
00052         }
00053         else if (newVelLength > m_fMaxVelocity)
00054         {
00055                 NiPoint3 heading = newVel;
00056                 heading.Unitize();      
00057                 newVel = m_fMaxVelocity*heading;
00058         }
00059 
00060         // set old velocity to new velocity
00061         currentVel = newVel;
00062 }
00063 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
